verses.verse: וַיַּ֛עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> the altar הָעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> of burnt offering עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> [of] shittim חָמֵשׁ֩ <WH2568> five אַמּ֨וֹת <WH520> cubits אָרְכּ֜וֹ <WH753> [was] the length וְחָֽמֵשׁ־ <WH2568> thereof and five אַמּ֤וֹת <WH520> cubits רָחְבּוֹ֙ <WH7341> the breadth רָב֔וּעַ <WH7251> thereof [it was] foursquare וְשָׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> and three אַמּ֖וֹת <WH520> cubits קֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6967> the height

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made קַרְנֹתָ֗יו <WH7161> the horns עַ֚ל <WH5921> on אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> thereof on the four פִּנֹּתָ֔יו <WH6438> corners מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> at הָי֣וּ <WH1961> being קַרְנֹתָ֑יו <WH7161> of it the horns וַיְצַ֥ף <WH6823> thereof were of the same and he overlaid אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> it with brass

וַיַּ֜עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> all the vessels הַמִּזְבֵּ֗חַ <WH4196> of the altar אֶת־ <WH853> הַסִּירֹ֤ת <WH5518> the pots וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּעִים֙ <WH3257> and the shovels וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּזְרָקֹ֔ת <WH4219> and the basons אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּזְלָגֹ֖ת <WH4207> [and] the fleshhooks וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּחְתֹּ֑ת <WH4289> and the firepans כָּל־ <WH3605> all כֵּלָ֖יו <WH3627> all the vessels עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> thereof made נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> he [of] brass

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made לַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> for the altar מִכְבָּ֔ר <WH4345> grate מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH4639> act רֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7568> network נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <WH5178> a brasen תַּ֧חַת <WH8478> beneath כַּרְכֻּבּ֛וֹ <WH3749> under the compass מִלְּמַ֖טָּה <WH4295> thereof beneath עַד־ <WH5704> reaching חֶצְיֽוֹ׃ <WH2677> unto the midst

וַיִּצֹ֞ק <WH3332> And he cast אַרְבַּ֧ע <WH702> four טַבָּעֹ֛ת <WH2885> rings בְּאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> for the four הַקְּצָוֹ֖ת <WH7099> ends לְמִכְבַּ֣ר <WH4345> of the grate הַנְּחֹ֑שֶׁת <WH5178> of brass בָּתִּ֖ים <WH1004> [to be] places לַבַּדִּֽים׃ <WH905> for the staves

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּדִּ֖ים <WH905> the staves עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> [of] shittim וַיְצַ֥ף <WH6823> and overlaid אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> them with brass

וַיָּבֵ֨א <WH935> And he put אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּדִּ֜ים <WH905> the staves בַּטַּבָּעֹ֗ת <WH2885> into the rings עַ֚ל <WH5921> on צַלְעֹ֣ת <WH6763> on the sides הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> of the altar לָשֵׂ֥את <WH5375> to bear אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> בָּהֶ֑ם נְב֥וּב <WH5014> the altar hollow לֻחֹ֖ת <WH3871> with boards עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> it withal he made אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853> ס

וַיַּ֗עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֵ֚ת <WH853> הַכִּיּ֣וֹר <WH3595> the laver נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <WH5178> [of] brass וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> כַּנּ֣וֹ <WH3653> and the foot נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <WH5178> of it [of] brass בְּמַרְאֹת֙ <WH4759> of the lookingglasses הַצֹּ֣בְאֹ֔ת <WH6633> of [the women] assembling אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who צָֽבְא֔וּ <WH6633> which assembled פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> [at] the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation ס

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֶת־ <WH853> הֶחָצֵ֑ר <WH2691> the court לִפְאַ֣ת ׀ <WH6285> side נֶ֣גֶב <WH5045> on the south תֵּימָ֗נָה <WH8486> southward קַלְעֵ֤י <WH7050> the hangings הֶֽחָצֵר֙ <WH2691> of the court שֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8336> linen מָשְׁזָ֔ר <WH7806> [were of] fine twined מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> an hundred בָּאַמָּֽה׃ <WH520> cubits

עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5982> Their pillars עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <WH6242> [were] twenty וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם <WH134> sockets עֶשְׂרִ֖ים <WH6242> twenty נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <WH5178> and their brasen וָוֵ֧י <WH2053> the hooks הָעַמֻּדִ֛ים <WH5982> of the pillars וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם <WH2838> and their fillets כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> [were of] silver

וְלִפְאַ֤ת <WH6285> side צָפוֹן֙ <WH6828> And for the north מֵאָ֣ה <WH3967> [the hangings were] an hundred בָֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> cubits עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5982> their pillars עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <WH6242> [were] twenty וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם <WH134> and their sockets עֶשְׂרִ֖ים <WH6242> twenty נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <WH5178> of brass וָוֵ֧י <WH2053> the hooks הָֽעַמּוּדִ֛ים <WH5982> of the pillars וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם <WH2838> and their fillets כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> [of] silver

וְלִפְאַת־ <WH6285> side יָ֗ם <WH3220> And for the west קְלָעִים֙ <WH7050> [were] hangings חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> of fifty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> cubits עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֥ם <WH5982> their pillars עֲשָׂרָ֔ה <WH6235> ten וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH134> and their sockets עֲשָׂרָ֑ה <WH6235> ten וָוֵ֧י <WH2053> the hooks הָעַמֻּדִ֛ים <WH5982> of the pillars וַחֲשׁוּקֵיהֶ֖ם <WH2838> and their fillets כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> [of] silver
וְלִפְאַ֛ת <WH6285> side קֵ֥דְמָה <WH6924> And for the east מִזְרָ֖חָה <WH4217> eastward חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty אַמָּֽה׃ <WH520> cubits

קְלָעִ֛ים <WH7050> The hangings חֲמֵשׁ־ <WH2568> fif עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <WH6240> teen אַמָּ֖ה <WH520> cubits אֶל־ <WH413> about הַכָּתֵ֑ף <WH3802> of the one side עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5982> their pillars שְׁלֹשָׁ֔ה <WH7969> three וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH134> and their sockets שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> three

וְלַכָּתֵ֣ף <WH3802> side הַשֵּׁנִ֗ית <WH8145> And for the other מִזֶּ֤ה <WH2088> he וּמִזֶּה֙ <WH2088> he לְשַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate הֶֽחָצֵ֔ר <WH2691> of the court קְלָעִ֕ים <WH7050> on this hand and that hand [were] hangings חֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> fif עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> teen אַמָּ֑ה <WH520> cubits עַמֻּדֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5982> their pillars שְׁלֹשָׁ֔ה <WH7969> three וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH134> and their sockets שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> three
כָּל־ <WH3605> All קַלְעֵ֧י <WH7050> All the hangings הֶחָצֵ֛ר <WH2691> of the court סָבִ֖יב <WH5439> round about שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8336> linen מָשְׁזָֽר׃ <WH7806> [were] of fine twined

וְהָאֲדָנִ֣ים <WH134> And the sockets לָֽעַמֻּדִים֮ <WH5982> for the pillars נְחֹשֶׁת֒ <WH5178> [were of] brass וָוֵ֨י <WH2053> the hooks הָֽעַמּוּדִ֜ים <WH5982> of the pillars וַחֲשׁוּקֵיהֶם֙ <WH2838> and their fillets כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> [of] silver וְצִפּ֥וּי <WH6826> and the overlaying רָאשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <WH7218> of their chapiters כָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> [of] silver וְהֵם֙ <WH1992> like מְחֻשָּׁקִ֣ים <WH2836> [were] filleted כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> with silver כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> and all עַמֻּדֵ֥י <WH5982> and all the pillars הֶחָצֵֽר׃ <WH2691> of the court

וּמָסַ֞ךְ <WH4539> And the hanging שַׁ֤עַר <WH8179> for the gate הֶחָצֵר֙ <WH2691> of the court מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> was the work רֹקֵ֔ם <WH7551> of the weaver תְּכֵ֧לֶת <WH8504> [of] blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <WH713> and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <WH8144> and scarlet וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8336> linen מָשְׁזָ֑ר <WH7806> and fine twined וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> and twenty אַמָּה֙ <WH520> cubits אֹ֔רֶךְ <WH753> [was] the length וְקוֹמָ֤ה <WH6967> and the height בְרֹ֙חַב֙ <WH7341> in the breadth חָמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> [was] five אַמּ֔וֹת <WH520> cubits לְעֻמַּ֖ת <WH5980> answerable קַלְעֵ֥י <WH7050> to the hangings הֶחָצֵֽר׃ <WH2691> of the court

וְעַמֻּֽדֵיהֶם֙ <WH5982> And their pillars אַרְבָּעָ֔ה <WH702> [were] four וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם <WH134> and their sockets אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> four נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <WH5178> [of] brass וָוֵיהֶ֣ם <WH2053> their hooks כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> [of] silver וְצִפּ֧וּי <WH6826> and the overlaying רָאשֵׁיהֶ֛ם <WH7218> of their chapiters וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם <WH2838> and their fillets כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> [of] silver

וְֽכָל־ <WH3605> All הַיְתֵדֹ֞ת <WH3489> And all the pins לַמִּשְׁכָּ֧ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle וְלֶחָצֵ֛ר <WH2691> and of the court סָבִ֖יב <WH5439> round about נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> [were of] brass ס

אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> This פְקוּדֵ֤י <WH6485> is the sum הַמִּשְׁכָּן֙ <WH4908> of the tabernacle מִשְׁכַּ֣ן <WH4908> [even] of the tabernacle הָעֵדֻ֔ת <WH5715> of testimony אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> as they פֻּקַּ֖ד <WH6485> as it was counted עַל־ <WH5921> according פִּ֣י <WH6310> according to the commandment מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> of Moses עֲבֹדַת֙ <WH5656> [for] the service הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> of the Levites בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> by the hand אִֽיתָמָ֔ר <WH385> of Ithamar בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> son אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> to Aaron הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> the priest

וּבְצַלְאֵ֛ל <WH1212> And Bezaleel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אוּרִ֥י <WH221> of Uri בֶן־ <WH1121> the son ח֖וּר <WH2354> of Hur לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> of the tribe יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah עָשָׂ֕ה <WH6213> made אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> all that the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses

וְאִתּ֗וֹ <WH854> With אָהֳלִיאָ֞ב <WH171> And with him [was] Aholiab בֶּן־ <WH1121> son אֲחִיסָמָ֛ךְ <WH294> of Ahisamach לְמַטֵּה־ <WH4294> of the tribe דָ֖ן <WH1835> of Dan חָרָ֣שׁ <WH2796> an engraver וְחֹשֵׁ֑ב <WH2803> and a cunning workman וְרֹקֵ֗ם <WH7551> and an embroiderer בַּתְּכֵ֙לֶת֙ <WH8504> in blue וּבָֽאַרְגָּמָ֔ן <WH713> and in purple וּבְתוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> oppressor הַשָּׁנִ֖י <WH8144> scarlet וּבַשֵּֽׁשׁ׃ <WH8336> and fine linen ס

כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַזָּהָ֗ב <WH2091> All the gold הֶֽעָשׂוּי֙ <WH6213> that was occupied לַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> for the work בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all מְלֶ֣אכֶת <WH4399> in all the work הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the holy וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> even זְהַ֣ב <WH2091> [place] even the gold הַתְּנוּפָ֗ה <WH8573> of the offering תֵּ֤שַׁע <WH8672> and nine וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <WH6242> was twenty כִּכָּ֔ר <WH3603> talents וּשְׁבַ֨ע <WH7651> and seven מֵא֧וֹת <WH3967> hundred וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <WH7970> and thirty שֶׁ֖קֶל <WH8255> shekels בְּשֶׁ֥קֶל <WH8255> after the shekel הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> of the sanctuary

וְכֶ֛סֶף <WH3701> And the silver פְּקוּדֵ֥י <WH6485> of them that were numbered הָעֵדָ֖ה <WH5712> of the congregation מְאַ֣ת <WH3967> [was] an hundred כִּכָּ֑ר <WH3603> talents וְאֶלֶף֩ <WH505> and a thousand וּשְׁבַ֨ע <WH7651> seven מֵא֜וֹת <WH3967> hundred וַחֲמִשָּׁ֧ה <WH2568> fif וְשִׁבְעִ֛ים <WH7657> seventy שֶׁ֖קֶל <WH8255> shekels בְּשֶׁ֥קֶל <WH8255> after the shekel הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> of the sanctuary

בֶּ֚קַע <WH1235> A bekah לַגֻּלְגֹּ֔לֶת <WH1538> for every man מַחֲצִ֥ית <WH4276> [that is] half הַשֶּׁ֖קֶל <WH8255> a shekel בְּשֶׁ֣קֶל <WH8255> after the shekel הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary לְכֹ֨ל <WH3605> that הָעֹבֵ֜ר <WH5674> for every one that went עַל־ <WH5921> unto הַפְּקֻדִ֗ים <WH6485> to be numbered מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and upward לְשֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> for six מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred אֶ֙לֶף֙ <WH505> thousand וּשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> and three אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> and five מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וַחֲמִשִּֽׁים׃ <WH2572> and fifty

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become מְאַת֙ <WH3967> And of the hundred כִּכַּ֣ר <WH3603> talents הַכֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> of silver לָצֶ֗קֶת <WH3332> were cast אֵ֚ת <WH853> אַדְנֵ֣י <WH134> the sockets הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> אַדְנֵ֣י <WH134> and the sockets הַפָּרֹ֑כֶת <WH6532> of the vail מְאַ֧ת <WH3967> an hundred אֲדָנִ֛ים <WH134> sockets לִמְאַ֥ת <WH3967> of the hundred הַכִּכָּ֖ר <WH3603> talents כִּכָּ֥ר <WH3603> a talent לָאָֽדֶן׃ <WH134> for a socket
